segments.text: You ’ re a big fan of Andy Lau , aren ’ t you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I ’ Ve been got all his albums and most of his films on DVD . I adore him . He ’ s my idol .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How come you don ’ t have all of his films on DVD ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Some of his early films are hard to find nowadays , especially the ones where he only played a bit part .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I see . I ’ m sure you ’ ll find them one day . I see you also have several poster of him .

segments.text: Yes . These posters are new . I bought them last week and put them up on my bedroom walls yesterday .

segments.text: Are you a member of his fan club ?
